dict.acceptation: 噪音；嘈杂声，喧闹声；声音，声响；杂音；

sent.orig: After making a simple relief base, the mesh was subdivided to receive the Noise modifier.
sent.trans: 在制作了简单的雕塑基础之后，网格被子细分(subdivide)后用来接受Noise修改器。

sent.orig: The common image noise is the main additive noise, multiplicative noise and quantization noise.
sent.trans: 图像的常见噪声主要有加性噪声、乘性噪声和量化噪声等。

sent.orig: The noise conditions defined by the paper include two factors: noise strength and noise distribution density.
sent.trans: 本文中定义的噪声条件包括噪声强度及噪声分布密度两个因素。

sent.orig: Meanwhile post-stack noise removing help improve signal-to-noise further and attenuating noise arousing from processing.
sent.trans: 叠后噪音衰减进一步提高剖面信噪比，衰减处理过程带来的噪音，弥补叠前噪音衰减的不足。

sent.orig: Noise is included aerodynamic noise and structure noise.
sent.trans: 噪声主要包括气动噪声和结构噪声。
